description: Improve placement and clarity of road signs to warn drivers near schools and intersections.
Install zebra crossings and pedestrian signals to ensure pedestrian safety.
Install speed humps and rumble strips to reduce vehicle speed near schools and residential areas.
Install high-intensity LED street lights to improve visibility during night time.
Install metal beam crash barriers on sharp curves and embankments.
Repaint faded lane markings and pedestrian crossings for improved guidance.
Optimize traffic signal timings to reduce red-light violations and congestion.
Redesign road geometry and signage at accident-prone black spots.
Provide paved shoulders to allow safe vehicle recovery and avoid edge drop-offs.
Install speed cameras and display warning signs for strict enforcement.
Ensure proper drainage systems to prevent skidding and surface damage.
Repair potholes and resurface damaged sections for smoother movement.
Construct bus bays to prevent lane blockage by stationary buses.
Install guardrails to separate pedestrian movement from vehicles.
Install crash barriers on bridges and culverts to prevent vehicle fall accidents.
